short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Chrome apps and other programming documents easily with this Text app-based code solution which replaces CDE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celestia IDE for Chrome is a text editor built off of CodeMirror, and Text.app that plans to replace the Chrome Dev Editor. This software is not fully finished, but is functional as a regular text editor.

0.1 Release Notes
--------------------------
*New icons to replace the non-material ones from Text.app
*New themes to replace "Default" and "Light" from Text.app : Celestia and Chrysalis.

Coming soon:
*A wizard to create Chrome apps (manifest.json, background.js)
*New theme to replace "Sir Rice"

Celestia IDE icon made by Northwestcore: http://northwestcore.deviantart.com/art/Request-Icon-Pack-401562458
*More Material Design implementation
